name: Escape Roots
description:
Once upon a time, there was a brave miner named Jack who worked in a deep and dark mine. One day, as he was digging for precious minerals, a powerful earthquake caused the mine to collapse, trapping Jack inside.

Days went by and Jack was running low on food and water. Just when he thought all hope was lost, he stumbled upon a strange and eerie chamber. In the center of the room stood a massive monster made entirely of roots and vines. The monster let out a deafening roar and Jack realized that he was not alone in the ruined mine after all.
